name: Weddingopoly (Traditional)
description:
Wedding games are a natural way to encourage interaction and include your guests in your big day. For the best wedding board game for guests both young and old, check out our truly do-it-yourself Wedding-Opoly game today!

Optional Game Features

1. Change or Add your cards and have them appear in the game.
2. Add your Photos and have them appear in the game
3. Change amount of money played in the game
4. Change avatars and names
